narcotics_regulations.general_description: Regulations governing the import, export, and transit of narcotics and psychotropic substances, with customs authorities monitoring compliance and combating smuggling.

authorities.customs_role: Monitor importation, exportation and transit of narcotics, combat smuggling
authorities.violation_response: Contact competent authorities (Swissmedic, police, etc.) when violations occur
authorities.decision_authority: Competent authorities decide on further steps for violations
